Trader Rex:
Welcome! Welcome to the Ivory Tower!
This place is known as a sanctuary magicians, but there is not only sorcerers. This can come each. I myself was once a paladin in the service of Einhasad. But I did not betray the oath!
As you know, strange things often happen in this tower. Do not go there, where you should not, even if you will be very interesting. It may be dangerous.
